 1  sgeinstall_template = """ 
 2  SGE_CLUSTER_NAME="starcluster" 
 3  SGE_ROOT="/opt/sge6" 
 4  SGE_QMASTER_PORT="63231" 
 5  SGE_EXECD_PORT="63232" 
 6  SGE_ENABLE_SMF="false" 
 7  CELL_NAME="default" 
 8  ADMIN_USER="" 
 9  QMASTER_SPOOL_DIR="/opt/sge6/default/spool/qmaster" 
10  EXECD_SPOOL_DIR="/opt/sge6/default/spool" 
11  GID_RANGE="20000-20100" 
12  SPOOLING_METHOD="classic" 
13  DB_SPOOLING_SERVER="none" 
14  DB_SPOOLING_DIR="/opt/sge6/default/spooldb" 
15  PAR_EXECD_INST_COUNT="20" 
16  ADMIN_HOST_LIST="%s" 
17  SUBMIT_HOST_LIST="%s" 
18  EXEC_HOST_LIST="%s" 
19  EXECD_SPOOL_DIR_LOCAL="/opt/sge6/default/spool/exec_spool_local" 
20  HOSTNAME_RESOLVING="true" 
21  SHELL_NAME="ssh" 
22  COPY_COMMAND="scp" 
23  DEFAULT_DOMAIN="none" 
24  ADMIN_MAIL="none@none.edu" 
25  ADD_TO_RC="false" 
26  SET_FILE_PERMS="true" 
27  RESCHEDULE_JOBS="wait" 
28  SCHEDD_CONF="1" 
29  SHADOW_HOST="" 
30  EXEC_HOST_LIST_RM="" 
31  REMOVE_RC="true" 
32  WINDOWS_SUPPORT="false" 
33  WIN_ADMIN_NAME="Administrator" 
34  WIN_DOMAIN_ACCESS="false" 
35  CSP_RECREATE="false" 
36  CSP_COPY_CERTS="false" 
37  CSP_COUNTRY_CODE="US" 
38  CSP_STATE="MA" 
39  CSP_LOCATION="BOSTON" 
40  CSP_ORGA="MIT" 
41  CSP_ORGA_UNIT="OEIT" 
42  CSP_MAIL_ADDRESS="none@none.edu" 
43  """

45  sge_pe_template = """ 
46  pe_name           %s 
47  slots             %s 
48  user_lists        NONE 
49  xuser_lists       NONE 
50  start_proc_args   /bin/true 
51  stop_proc_args    /bin/true 
52  allocation_rule   $round_robin 
53  control_slaves    TRUE 
54  job_is_first_task FALSE 
55  urgency_slots     min 
56  accounting_summary FALSE 
57  """

59  sgeprofile_template = """ 
60  export SGE_ROOT="/opt/sge6" 
61  export SGE_CELL="default" 
62  export SGE_CLUSTER_NAME="starcluster" 
63  export SGE_QMASTER_PORT="63231" 
64  export SGE_EXECD_PORT="63232" 
65  export MANTYPE="man" 
66  export MANPATH="$MANPATH:$SGE_ROOT/man" 
67  export PATH="$PATH:$SGE_ROOT/bin/%(arch)s" 
68  export ROOTPATH="$ROOTPATH:$SGE_ROOT/bin/%(arch)s" 
69  export LDPATH="$LDPATH:$SGE_ROOT/lib/%(arch)s" 
70  """
